# MutableURLRequest | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

Type Alias# MutableURLRequest

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
typealias MutableURLRequest = NSMutableURLRequest
```

Deprecated

Use a [`URLRequest`](/documentation/foundation/urlrequest) variable instead.

## [See Also](/documentation/Foundation/MutableURLRequest#see-also)

### [Using reference types](/documentation/Foundation/MutableURLRequest#Using-reference-types)

[`class NSURLRequest`](/documentation/foundation/nsurlrequest)A URL load request that is independent of protocol or URL scheme.[`class NSMutableURLRequest`](/documentation/foundation/nsmutableurlrequest)A mutable URL load request that is independent of protocol or URL scheme.
